commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: There are a ton of people in front of the stage already!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Not just the Summer Festival attendees but even the food cart owners have come to watch.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: This is finally it. Aqours' special Summer Festival live show.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Let's do our absolute best to ensure everyone who came has fun until the very end.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: The dark feast Yohane weaves shall paint over memories of this fun festival!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Then everyone will forget the delicious food we made and our special Bon dance, zura.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: The wait until we get out there is torment. Can we just go out early?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: How about putting on some Japanese stand-up comedy until we start? Like a skit, for example.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: What are we going to do by turning this into a comedy show?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I don't think so. Please respect the time slot we've been given.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I understand getting cold feet, but this is it, the final act. Just calm your nerves.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: How is everyone's costume? Feeling okay?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I'm fine! It fits perfectly, as always.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: The costumes You and Ruby make always fit everyone perfectly. We believe in you.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You all look great. Super cute!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: *Giggle* Thanks. You're making me blush.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Zuramaru, is your stomach okay? You ate so much, like the okonomiyaki, beef sticks, crepes, and such.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: No need to worry about me, zura. I made sure not to overeat, just for the show! My stomach is nice and flat as proof!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Oh, good. I guess we don't need to worry about your waist now.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Uh, Ruby?

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: Wha... N-No, Hanamaru! It's not like I'm always worried about the waists on your costumes because you eat so much! Not at all!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Zuraaaaaa!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: You know, Ruby, for someone with such a harmless face, you sure are harsh.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: I said it wasn't like that!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Before I came to Numazu, I never imagined I'd be waiting backstage with Aqours for their live show to start.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: We almost didn't even get to do the show.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I doubt anyone could have foreseen things getting canceled, then having it retracted.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: You never know what life will throw at you.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: The typhoon passed overnight, we convinced the Committee and the locals and tourists helped with the clean-up.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: The love for festivals and several miracles came together to make this Summer Festival possible.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Yeah, that's right. Oh, it's just almost time.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: It's time to begin the Summer Festival Special live show!

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Draw back the curtains to reveal the dark feast!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: It's finally here! I'm a little disappointed we didn't get to do a skit though.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Wait, you were serious about that?!

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: *Sigh* I'm getting more nervous by the second.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: So am I, zura. I don't know which works better, stroking my palms or taking deep breaths.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Can't go wrong if you just do both.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Okay, everyone!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, hold on a second!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Hm? What is it?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: A picture... Can I take a picture? I want to capture the expression of all you as you wait to go live!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Of course! Give me the camera.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Let's see, here's the timer button. This looks like a good place for the camera. Okay everyone, get together!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Okay!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: We can fit everyone if we stand in three rows.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: You can stand next to Chika.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: W-Wait, why am I in it, too?!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Oh, just get in here. *Chuckle*

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Everyone smile! Three, two, one, Aqours!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Hello everyone! We're Aqours! Thank you all for coming!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: We're going to sing our hearts out so all of you can have a great time!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Such passion... There are so many people here enjoying themselves just for a single school idol group.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (The thought put into the lyrics, the practice that went into the dancing. The passion of wanting everyone at the festival to enjoy themselves.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (All that has mixed together and has been completed up on that stage, right now. They're shining brilliantly, just like the first show I saw.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (It makes my blood run so hot it burns. It moves me so much I could cry.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Amazing... Aqours truly is amazing.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ayumu, Kasumi, Shizuku.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Karin, Ai, Kanata.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Setsuna, Emma, and Rina.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I want to put on a show like this together. A show that will resonate in the hearts of the people more than anyone else could ever do!)
